As a veteran of the US army, I find it unconscionable that an Army sergeant would be indicted for murder in Travis County for defending himself against a BLM radical Marxist who pointed an AK-47 at him while he sat in his vehicle.

The fact that this is happening in TX is very disturbing. Are we to believe that we can no longer defend ourselves against these radical Marxists that occupy our streets and block traffic?

I call upon Governor Greg Abbott to make sure that these charges are dropped immediately. For I know one thing, if I was in the Governor’s office, the charges would be dropped.

Happy Juneteenth  folks, it’s the day when Blacks in Texas learned that they were free, June 19, 1865 in Galveston.

But what does today mean?

It’s the day when Blacks found out that the first Republican President had signed the Emancipation Proclamation freeing them from the physical bondage of the Democrat Party. It was two years later, on July 4th 1867, that 150 of those same Black men met in Houston and established the Republican Party of Texas. The Democrats, in response, established the Ku Klux Klan.

Today, the Democrats are economically enslaving Blacks and have turned inner city communities into modern plantations of welfare and economic dependence.

Juneteenth  is a celebration of why the Republican Party was established in 1854, the abolition of slavery. Only a flaming incompetent idiot would give the party of the jackass any credit for Juneteenth .
https://www.foxnews.com/media/allen-west-border-crisis-texas-sovereignty-biden-constitution

Who would have ever thought the day would come when Texas would need Florida to come to its rescue to secure our own border?

Or that Texas would crowd source funding to secure its sovereignty?

And, how is it that Texas -- the most energy rich State in America -- would not be able to supply power to its citizens?

These are very disconcerting failures.

So, what’s next to be mandated under penalty of losing employment? Doggone, I thought this was Texas . . . not some tyrannical blue state.

https://www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/judge-tosses-houston-hospital-workers-lawsuit-over-vaccine-requirement-2021-06-13/

A very special thanks to the Collin County Republican Party who gave me this framing of The American’s Creed as a farewell gift for serving as the Chairman of the Republican Party of Texas.

My oath and this creed is what I live everyday. There are those who walk amongst us who do not embrace these words. I will never surrender my country to them. And, my coming decision will be a new chapter in my commitment and dedication to serving God, Country, and Texas.

Angela and I had dinner last night with an amazing young Christian couple, Nick Vujicic and his wife Kanae at Texas restaurant in Richardson. Nick and Kanae just moved here from California and he leads a phenomenal ministry called Life without Limbs. Nick is living proof that to be the hands and feet of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ, you just need a passionate heart and a courageous voice.
This is heaven on earth...

"Soldiers, Sailors and Airmen of the Allied Expeditionary Force!

You are about to embark upon the Great Crusade, toward which we have striven these many months. The eyes of the world are upon you. The hopes and prayers of liberty-loving people everywhere march with you. In company with our brave Allies and brothers-in-arms on other Fronts, you will bring about the destruction of the German war machine, the elimination of Nazi tyranny over the oppressed peoples of Europe, and security for ourselves in a free world.

Your task will not be an easy one. Your enemy is well trained, well equipped and battle hardened. He will fight savagely.

But this is the year 1944 ! Much has happened since the Nazi triumphs of 1940-41. The United Nations have inflicted upon the Germans great defeats, in open battle, man-to-man. Our air offensive has seriously reduced their strength in the air and their capacity to wage war on the ground.

Our Home Fronts have given us an superiority in weapons and munitions of war, and placed at our disposal great reserves of trained fighting men. The tide has turned! The free men of the world marching together to Victory!

I have full confidence in your devotion to duty and skill in battle.
We will accept nothing less than full Victory!

Good Luck! And let us all beseech blessing of Almighty God upon this great and noble undertaking.

Signed: General Dwight D. Eisenhower"

May we never forget this great day which signifies the liberation of the European continent from the scourge of national socialism and fascism. They’re the men of our Greatest Generation.

Humbled and blessed to have served . . .

A very Happy Mother's Day to all the moms out there! On this day, I want to especially acknowledge my wife, Angela, an amazing mother to our daughters, Aubrey and Austen; and also, to Austen, who will be giving birth to our first grandchild shortly.

The racist Texas Democrats are cackling about the Texas Republican legislature passing election integrity legislation.

Hearing Democrats invoke Jim Crow and voter suppression is beyond laughable. The history of the Democrat Party is one that includes the creation and implementation of Jim Crow policies. The Democrats established the Ku Klux Klan for the purpose of enforcing their Jim Crow policies and suppression of the Black electorate voting. Remember, Democrats voted against the 13th, 14th, and 15th amendments. As well, the longest filibuster in US Senate history was Senate Democrats against the 1964 Civil Rights Act, which passed because of Senate Republicans led by Everett Dirksen.

Is there any wonder why Democrats are trying to revise US history? Folks, you have gotta be stuck on stupid to pay attention to or believe anything the party of systemic racism says.

Election integrity makes it easier to vote but harder to cheat. Democrats cheating in Texas? Yep, shall I say Chris Hollins?

Congratulations to Texas Republicans for resounding success across the Lone Star State in our municipal elections. I am so very proud of how our grassroots came together and produced record turnout.

However, there's a little matter that deserves our attention. It appears that Lamar County Democratic Party Chairman Gary O'Connor took to social media and disparaged Sen. Tim Scott by calling him the racist slur "Oreo."

Not surprisingly, the Party of systemic racism has defended him and he is yet to resign. It's time to use one of Saul Alinsky's tactics, ridicule, against the Texas Democratic Party.

Let's all mail or personally deliver a package of Oreos to the Texas Democrat Party headquarters until their racist chairman from Lamar County, Gary O'Connor resigns.

I will be doing so, as I find O'Connor's remarks, and his defense, utterly offensive and disgusting. Then again, what should we expect from the Party that founded the Ku Klux Klan and Jim Crow?

Good morning everyone! What a surprise to be presented Max Greiner Jr.’s Sword of the Spirit, #152, at his art exhibition at The Hope Center. The inscription in Hebrew reads ‘King of kings and Lord of lords’. I am so deeply humbled and honored by this distinction that comes from Ephesians Chapter 6, verses 10-18. We are indeed facing a spiritual battle in America where we must don the full armor of God. And carry the Sword of the Spirit.

Looking forward to this event in June with my friends Clarence Henderson & Maj Toure:

https://www.eventbrite.com/e/an-evening-with-allen-west-clarence-henderson-maj-toure-tickets-151470958715?fbclid=IwAR3vMDBpGQh0hcY5bxrv73LGj8RaO5r9SwUYAaU8snTZ4-8z0mEWJ2TPDTo

Me with famed Christian artist and sculptor Max Greiner, Jr. of Kerrville, Texas, and his Lion of Judah. We are hosting Max for an exhibition of his work at The Hope Center tomorrow (4/22) from 9am - 3pm.

Today is April 21st. One-hundred-eighty-five years ago, Texas secured its independence at the Battle of San Jacinto where Santa Anna’s army was defeated in 18 minutes by the inspired Texians who shouted, "Remember The Alamo" and "Remember La Bahia (Goliad)."

Today Texas faces a new invasion from the south, ushered in by the terrorist Mexican cartels. We must rally again to Hold Texas, Hold the Nation. God bless Texas!
